about_the_game:
This is an adult only game, with graphic sexual content.

Suflower is a Visual Novel centered around a girl named Alina. Alina is a southern belle and loves walking around her sunflower fields near her house. When Alina is not relaxing at her house, she is busy attending LVN University. Alina is a student enrolled in the LVN News Reporting program. With her friends Ivanna and Nadiya, they try their best to investigate a mysterious student that has caused trouble for them in the past.

Sunflower also includes a comic book subplot about a girl named Captain Yuri. Captain Yuri is a super hero who can travel between dimensions. Captain Yuri is a funny parody of the super hero genre.

Sunflower features background music by Bittersweet Entertainment and Joel Steudler. It also has artwork by gin-1994 (background art) and DemonLordDante (CGs).

content_descriptors.notes: This game is a hentai visual novel.  It has full nudity and sexual interactions between 2 female characters.  All characters are 18 years or older.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Play as Alina, an eccentric southern belle. Roam through the beautiful sunflower fields on an adventure to discover the truth behind a mysterious student.
